short_summary: Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
full_summary:
=================
### **Tender Announcement Notice**

#### **Notice Details**

* **Notice Title (English):** Cancelled OR23SLKN
* **Notice Title (French):** Annulé OR23SLKN
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-13
* **English Languages:** English
* **French Languages:** French
* **Closure Date:**  2026-03-31 at 14:00:00

#### **Tender Details**

* **Type of Tender:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Classification Schedule:** 
	+ * 5121A - Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
	+ * 5122A - Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
	+ * 5123B - Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
	+ * 5129B - Construction of Other Buildings
	+ * 5139A - Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
	+ * 5139C - General Heavy Construction
	+ * 5159B - Other Special Trade Construction Work

#### **Trade Agreements**
Apply to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### **Regions of Delivery**
Ontario, excluding National Capital Region (NCR)

#### **Regions of Opportunity**
* Canada
* Europe
* Mexico
* United States

#### **Contracting Entity Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Defence Construction Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K3
* **Contact Information**
	+ Mark Smith
	+ mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
	+ Tel: 613-859-0549

#### **Notice Description**
Please be advised that the tender has been cancelled. Any further information is void.
